title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17.Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On Motif platforms, the text fields in the Project Properties Info page are displaying automatic borders, indicating them as user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX platforms, these fields have different-colored backgrounds that make them stand out even more.
EB: The text fields in the Project Properties Info page should not display automatic borders on Motif platforms. Also, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX platforms, the fields should have the same background color as the rest of the page.
SR: To reproduce the issue, select a Project, right-click and choose Properties. Then, navigate to the Info page and observe the read-only fields such as Path, Type, etc.
